description:
Fire finally reaches Demon King Nanawarai!  Nanawarai once again demands Fire to return the "Seed of the Wind."  Meanwhile, Data, Gantetsu, and Mayuyu find the "Seed of the Wind", the very thing that has been accused of being stolen, within the Tree of the Wind!  Will Oroshi`s secret finally be revealed?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Truth Behind the Seed of the Wind
